topic.title: Transferring ZeroID from multiuser instance to "normal" client
topic.body:
How would I go about doing this?

Run a node on my server for me and a couple of friends when we're away from home, otherwise we all run our own clients. How would we have the same ZeroID on all of them? Thanks.

1_1LSqcdgCBoUofD1han9nyX37DHPvZRon3H.body:
> [fios](#comment_1_1KQrMKmLR6ifW1ZXd2ohHg4w5xq1KHhYXR): Omg mxm!! wjh is uujh

See, cos it's a double u.
